<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon's Rage Breath](/Feats.aspx?ID=5827) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 79 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per 10 minutes

**Prerequisites**
[dragon instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

You breathe deeply and exhale powerful energy in a 30-foot cone, dealing 1d6 damage per level to each creature in the area with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save against your class DC. The damage type matches your instinct's dragon breath, and this action gains the trait of your dragon instinct's tradition.
name: Dragon's Rage Breath
